title: About
text: Senior Data Scientist. Experienced R and Shiny developer, with examples of use cases in several large companies. Experienced with machine learning implementation to solve business problems. PhD and Master’s in Finance. Researcher in behavioral finance / economics, and capital markets. I also have a website, where articles about business, technology and data science are published.

title: About

2006-2009 - Undergraduate in Business Administration (Anhanguera)
